title: REDUCED: c1906 Carl Horner Photo used for T206 - Miller Huggins (Portrait)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: REDUCED: c1906 Carl Horner Photo used for T206 - Miller Huggins (Portrait)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an amazing Carl Horner Photo of Miller Huggins, c1906.  This photo was used for the 1906 Fan Craze set as well as the portrait shot of Huggins in "the Monster."

The photo is 3.25"x5.5" and is crystal clear.

<STRIKE>$1,750</STRIKE> $1,575 shipped.  PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/c1906%20Huggins%20Carl%20Horner%20Photo.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/c1906%20Huggins%20Carl%20Horner%20Photo%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
